installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:debian'


# Install packages. Default packages below are not required if using our existing install image thus speeding up the install process.
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install p7zip-full

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

export LOOT_VERSION_URL=$(curl -Ls -o /dev/null -w %{url_effective} https://github.com/loot/loot/releases/latest)
LOOT_VERSION=$(echo "$LOOT_VERSION_URL" | sed 's#.*/##')

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAPASS} ]] || printf %s "-betapassword ${SRCDS_BETAPASS}" ) ${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so


cd /mnt/server
# Check for NV-MP and install if needed
if [[ ! -f /mnt/server/nvmp_storyserver.exe ]]; then
  echo "Installing NVMP..."
  curl -sSL -o nvmp.zip https://github.com/NVMP/ClientDistribution/releases/latest/download/build_release_client.zip
  unzip nvmp.zip
  rm -rf nvmp.zip
fi

if [[ ! -f /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/users/container/AppData/Local/FalloutNV/plugins.txt ]]; then
  echo "Adding Ready Made Plugins.txt Settings..."
  curl -sSL -o plugins.txt https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CuteNatalie/nvmp-egg/refs/heads/main/plugins.txt
  mkdir -p /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/users/container/AppData/Local/FalloutNV/
  mv plugins.txt /mnt/server/.wine/drive_c/users/container/AppData/Local/FalloutNV/plugins.txt
fi

if [[ ! -f /mnt/server/nvse_loader.exe ]]; then
  echo "Installing NVSE..."
  curl -sSL -o nvse.7z https://github.com/xNVSE/NVSE/releases/download/6.3.4/nvse_6_3_4.7z
  7z x nvse.7z
  rm -rf nvse.7z
fi

if [[ ! -f /mnt/server/server.cfg ]]; then
  echo "Adding server.cfg..."
  curl -sSL -o server.cfg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CuteNatalie/nvmp-egg/refs/heads/main/server.cfg
fi

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "Please make sure to download these essential stability mods..."
echo "https://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/53635"
echo "https://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/79211"
echo "https://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/71973"
echo "https://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/80666"
echo "https://github.com/nvmp-main/New-Vegas-Tick-Fix/releases/download/10.2.2.3b/nvtf.7z"
echo "Install these files to Data\NVSE\Plugins"
echo "plugins.txt location is .wine/drive_c/users/container/AppData/Local/FalloutNV/"
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Auto Update
variables.description: Auto update the server on start.

variables.name: Difficulty
variables.description:
Globally overrides the difficulty in use by each player
Ranges from 0 for Very Easy, to 4 for Very Hard.

variables.name: Enable Console
variables.description: If enabled, players can use console to run cheats

variables.name: Enable Party System
variables.description: Enables the party system for all players

variables.name: Enable Saving
variables.description: If enabled, players can save their progress locally

variables.name: Enable Vats
variables.description: If enabled, players can use VATS in combat

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: Sets which port the server will listen on

variables.name: Is Hardcore
variables.description: Globally overrides the hardcore mode in use by each player

variables.name: Server Hostname
variables.description: Sets which hostname is listened to by the game server. Leave this as * if you don't know what this should be

variables.name: Steam Password
variables.description: Password for the Steam account to install a server.

variables.name: Steam Username
variables.description:
A steam username to use to install the server.
Only needed for games that need a user that owns the server

variables.name: Strict NVSE
variables.description: If enabled, NVSE must strictly be the same revision as the server
